snippet: Brig. Gen. Jeffrey A. Sinclair and his lawyers pursued a strategy of pleading guilty to lesser charges to focus his court-martial on the credibility of his accuser.
abstract: Military judge Col James L Pohl accepts guilty pleas from Brig Gen Jeffrey A Sinclair to misconduct charges, including possession of pornography and inappropriate relationships with female soldiers; general still faces court-martial on charges he sexually assaulted junior officer with whom he had extramarital relationship.
lead_paragraph: Brig. Gen. Jeffrey A. Sinclair and his lawyers pursued a strategy of pleading guilty to lesser charges to focus his court-martial on the credibility of his accuser.

headline.main: Facing Sexual Assault Trial, General Pleads Guilty to Misconduct
headline.print_headline: Facing Sex Assault Trial, General Pleads Guilty to Misconduct

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
